text: Maximin Isnard 16 November 1755 – 12 March 1825, French revolutionary, was a dealer in perfumery at Draguignan when he was elected deputy for the département of the Var to the Legislative Assembly, where he joined the Girondists.and presidents of the National Convention Category:1755 births Category:1825 deaths Category:Presidents of the National Convention Category:People from Var
title: Maximin Isnard
